> 'Rcpp' Interface to Kagome

## About

Interface to [ikawaha/Kagome](https://github.com/ikawaha/kagome); Self-contained Japanese morphological analyzer written in pure Go.

## System Requirements

- GNU make
- GNU GCC
- Go
- C++11

## Installation

```r
remotes::install_github("paithiov909/RcppKagome")
```

## Usage

```{r usage_1}
res <- RcppKagome::kagome("東京特許許可局")
print(res)
```

```{r usage_2}
res <- RcppKagome::kagome(c("東京特許許可局", "赤巻紙青巻紙黄巻紙"))
res <- RcppKagome::prettify(res)
head(res)
```
